languages.text: "Слишком многое указывает на то, что Немезит — это келерморф, специальная ксеноединица, выведенная для подрывной деятельности. Эта тварь использует недовольство масс, чтобы подтолкнуть людей к бунту и обезглавить имперское руководство, заменив их генокультистами. Келерморф надевает маску народного предводителя, чтобы вести мятежную чернь на бунт. И он не остановится в попытках убить вас, {name}".

"Too much evidence points to Nemesite being a Kelermorph, a special xenos unit bred for subversion. A Kelermorph utilises the discontent of the masses and incites them to revolt, with the end goal of removing local rulers loyal to the Imperium and installing Genestealer cultists in their place. This creature wears the mask of a populist leader, one who inspires the mutinous rabble. It will not stop until one of you is dead, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Слишком многое указывает на то, что Немезит — это келерморф, специальная ксеноединица, выведенная для подрывной деятельности. Эта тварь использует недовольство масс, чтобы подтолкнуть людей к бунту и обезглавить имперское руководство, заменив их генокультистами. Келерморф надевает маску народного предводителя, чтобы вести мятежную чернь на бунт. И он не остановится в попытках убить вас, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Too much evidence points to Nemesite being a Kelermorph, a special xenos unit bred for subversion. A Kelermorph utilises the discontent of the masses and incites them to revolt, with the end goal of beheading the local government and installing Genestealer cultists in its place. This creature wears the mask of the people's leader, one who inspires the mutinous rabble. It will not stop until one of you is dead, {name}."

"Too much evidence points to Nemesite being a Kelermorph, a special xenos unit bred for subversion. This creature wears the mask of a populist leader, one who inspires the mutinous rabble. It will not stop until one of you is dead, {name}."

languages.text: “太多证据表明，涅墨斯特属于基因窃取者教团的杀手种。这种特殊的异形单位是为了颠覆政权而培育出来的。杀手种会利用人民的不满，煽动他们发起暴乱，最终目标是除掉忠于帝国的统治者，用教团成员取而代之。这家伙戴着民粹主义领袖的面具，鼓动叛乱的乌合之众。他是不会停止煽动的，{name}。只有你们两人其中一方死亡，他才会住手。”
languages.original_text: "Too much evidence points to Nemesite being a Kelermorph, a special xenos unit bred for subversion. A Kelermorph utilises the discontent of the masses and incites them to revolt, with the end goal of removing local rulers loyal to the Imperium and installing Genestealer cultists in their place. This creature wears the mask of a populist leader, one who inspires the mutinous rabble. It will not stop until one of you is dead, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “太多证据表明，涅墨斯特属于基因窃取者教团的杀手种。这种特殊的异形单位是为了巅峰政权而培育出来的。杀手种会利用人民的不满，煽动他们发起暴乱，最终目标是除掉忠于帝国的统治者，用教团成员取而代之。这家伙戴着民粹主义领袖的面具，鼓动叛乱的乌合之众。他是不会停止煽动的，{name}。只有你们两人其中一方死亡，他才会住手。”

languages.text: «Hay abundantes pruebas que sugieren que Nemesitio es un kelermorfo, un ente xenos creado específicamente para la subversión. Un kelermorfo aprovecha el descontento de las masas y las incita a sublevarse con el fin de suprimir a las autoridades locales que son leales al Imperium y reemplazarlas por cultistas Genestealer. Esta criatura usa la máscara de un líder populista, alguien que inspira a la turba amotinada. No se detendrá hasta que uno de los dos haya muerto, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Too much evidence points to Nemesite being a Kelermorph, a special xenos unit bred for subversion. A Kelermorph utilises the discontent of the masses and incites them to revolt, with the end goal of removing local rulers loyal to the Imperium and installing Genestealer cultists in their place. This creature wears the mask of a populist leader, one who inspires the mutinous rabble. It will not stop until one of you is dead, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Hay abundantes pruebas que sugieren que Nemesitio es un kelermorfo, un ente xenos creado específicamente para la subversión. Un kelermorfo aprovecha el descontento de las masas y las incita a sublevarse con el fin de suprimir a las autoridades locales que son leales al Imperium y reemplazarlas por cultistas Genestealer. Esta criatura usa la máscara de un líder populista, alguien que inspira a la turba amotinada. No se detendrá hasta que uno de los dos haya muerto, {name}».

languages.text: 「多くの証拠がネメサイトがケラーモーフ、つまりは特別な異種族の種類であると示しています。ケラーモーフは大衆の不満を利用し、反乱を扇動する。帝国に忠誠を誓う地元の支配者を排除し、ジーンスティーラー・カルトをその座に据えるのが最終目的です。このクリーチャーは民衆指導者の仮面をかぶり、反乱を起こす民衆を鼓舞します。あなた方の一人が死ぬまで、きっと終わらないでしょう」{name}
languages.original_text: "Too much evidence points to Nemesite being a Kelermorph, a special xenos unit bred for subversion. A Kelermorph utilises the discontent of the masses and incites them to revolt, with the end goal of removing local rulers loyal to the Imperium and installing Genestealer cultists in their place. This creature wears the mask of a populist leader, one who inspires the mutinous rabble. It will not stop until one of you is dead, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「多くの証拠がネメサイトがケラーモーフ、つまりは特別な異種族の種類であると示しています。ケラーモーフは大衆の不満を利用し、反乱を扇動する。帝国に忠誠を誓う地元の支配者を排除し、ジーンスティーラー・カルトをその座に据えるのが最終目的です。このクリーチャーは民衆指導者の仮面をかぶり、反乱を起こす民衆を鼓舞します。あなた方の一人が死ぬまで、きっと終わらないでしょう」{name}

languages.text: "Zu viele Beweise deuten daraufhin, dass Nemesit ein Kelermorph ist, ein spezieller Xenos, geboren, um Zwietracht zu säen. Ein Kelermorph schürt die Unzufriedenheit der Massen, bis diese revoltieren, um die dem Imperium treu ergebenen Herrscher zu stürzen und durch Kultisten des Symbiontenkultes zu ersetzen. Diese Kreatur trägt die Maske eines Volkstribuns, der das meuternde Gesindel beflügelt. Er wird erst ruhen, wenn einer von Euch tot ist, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Too much evidence points to Nemesite being a Kelermorph, a special xenos unit bred for subversion. A Kelermorph utilises the discontent of the masses and incites them to revolt, with the end goal of removing local rulers loyal to the Imperium and installing Genestealer cultists in their place. This creature wears the mask of a populist leader, one who inspires the mutinous rabble. It will not stop until one of you is dead, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Zu viele Beweise deuten daraufhin, dass Nemesit ein Kelermorph ist, ein spezieller Xenos, geboren, um Zwietracht zu säen. Ein Kelermorph schürt die Unzufriedenheit der Massen, bis diese revoltieren, um die dem Imperium treu ergebenen Herrscher zu stürzen und durch Kultisten des Symbiontenkultes zu ersetzen. Diese Kreatur trägt die Maske eines Volkstribuns, der das meuternde Gesindel beflügelt. Er wird erst ruhen, wenn einer von Euch tot ist, {name}."

languages.text: « Trop d'indices concordent pour désigner Némésite comme un Kelemorphe, une unité xénos spécialisée dans la subversion. Ces créatures exploitent le mécontentement des masses laborieuses et les incitent à la révolte afin de renverser les autorités locales fidèles à l'Imperium et d'installer à leur place des cultistes Genestealer. Ce misérable porte le masque d'un chef populiste, un modèle à suivre pour les mutins des bas-fonds. Cette histoire ne s'arrêtera que lorsque l'un de vous deux aura été éliminé, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Too much evidence points to Nemesite being a Kelermorph, a special xenos unit bred for subversion. A Kelermorph utilises the discontent of the masses and incites them to revolt, with the end goal of removing local rulers loyal to the Imperium and installing Genestealer cultists in their place. This creature wears the mask of a populist leader, one who inspires the mutinous rabble. It will not stop until one of you is dead, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Trop d'indices concordent pour désigner Némésite comme un Kelemorphe, une unité xénos spécialisée dans la subversion. Ces créatures exploitent le mécontentement des masses laborieuses et les incitent à la révolte afin de renverser les autorités locales fidèles à l'Imperium et d'installer à leur place des cultistes Genestealer. Ce misérable porte le masque d'un chef populiste, un modèle à suivre pour les mutins des bas-fonds. Cette histoire ne s'arrêtera que lorsque l'un de vous deux aura été éliminé, {name}. »

languages.text: "Nemezit'in bir Kelermorf olduğuna işaret eden çok fazla delil var. Otoriteleri çökertmek için üretilmiş özel bir zeno birimi yani. Kelermorflar toplumlardaki huzursuzluktan yararlanır ve onları isyana teşvik ederek İmparatorluk'a sadık yerel hükümdarları indirmek ve onların yerine Gençalan tarikatçılar yerleştirmek amacı güder. Bu yaratık kitlelere hitap eden bir lider maskesi takar ve isyancı ayaktakımına ilham verir. İkinizden biri ölene kadar durmayacaktır {name}."
languages.original_text: "Too much evidence points to Nemesite being a Kelermorph, a special xenos unit bred for subversion. A Kelermorph utilises the discontent of the masses and incites them to revolt, with the end goal of removing local rulers loyal to the Imperium and installing Genestealer cultists in their place. This creature wears the mask of a populist leader, one who inspires the mutinous rabble. It will not stop until one of you is dead, {name}."
